roleset.name: intermittent
roleset.note: SPOTTY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-2,3. (from spotty.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: At best things have been spotty lately ... up and down .

roleset.name: covered in dots
roleset.note: SPOTTY-J NOTES: Added by Julia (from spotty.02-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: his face was spotty with birthmarks ranging in size from a dime to a half-dollar.
example.arg: with birthmarks ranging in size from a dime to a half-dollar
